rows.label: tlk41300011_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Yo, Rex. Looks like salvaging
is going pretty well for you.

rows.label: tlk41300011_01_msg0001
rows.name: Have you been to the Central Exchange?

rows.label: tlk41300011_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You should take the stuff
you salvage there, be it
collection items or treasure.

rows.label: tlk41300011_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If you can get them to buy it as
a set, you can sell it for more
than if you sold it individually.

rows.label: tlk41300011_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Making good use of that is
what makes a fine salvager.
